Module com.example.c482pa
Package com.example.c482pa.model

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
com.example.c482pa.model.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
This class has Part and Product objects. Various methods for these objects such as searching, deleting, and more have been provided.

      Method to search for a specific part by id
      Parameters:
      partId - The id to search for
      Returns:
      The Part object if the part is found. Else return null

    • deletePart

      public static boolean deletePart(Part selectedPart)
      Remove a Part from the Inventory
      Parameters:
      selectedPart - The Part object to be removed
      Returns:
      Returns true if the part was removed, if not then false is returned

    • updatePart

      public static void updatePart(int index, Part selectedPart)
      Update a Part object in the Inventory
      Parameters:
      index - The Part object to look up, helps determine the location of the object
      selectedPart - The Part object which will overwrite the existing Part

    • partDeleteValidation

      public static boolean partDeleteValidation(Part part)
      Iterates through the Part objects to confirm that part is not associated with one or more product
      Parameters:
      part - The part to delete
      Returns:
      Returns true if the part is associated with one or more products, false if it does not

    • productDeleteValidation

      public static boolean productDeleteValidation(Product product)
      Iterates through the Product objects to confirm that a product does not contain one or more parts
      Parameters:
      product - The product to delete
      Returns:
      Returns true if a product contains one or more parts, false if it does not

    • getAllRelatedParts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> getAllRelatedParts(Part partCheck)
      Checks a part to see if it is associated with a product
      Parameters:
      partCheck - The Part object that needs to be checked
      Returns:
      An ObservableList with all products that are associated with a part
